    • Constructor Detail

      • RewardItemEvent

        public RewardItemEvent(Integer _id,
               WinType _winType,
               org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack _itemStack)
        Constructor for RewardItemEvent.

        This event is triggered at the end of a minigame automatically and can be cancelled if no rewards are to be issued.
        Parameters:
        _id - The ID of the arena involved in this event.
        _winType - The WinType of the arena involved in this event.
        _itemStack - The ItemStack to give to players, complete with amount and any lore, etc.
